description:
Mountain weather can change in a moment, luckily, so can you. When dealing with fickle backcountry weather, versatility is a beautiful thing. The Vicolo pants go from lightweight hiking pants, to lightweight hiking shorts as needed, keeping you comfy when clouds roll in or roll out.

  • Midweight nylon spandex blend dries quickly, has a comfortable stretch, and is Bluesign approved
  • Zippered hand pockets keep necessities close and safe
  • Zippered vents at the cuff add a little airflow and make length adjustment easy
  • UPF50+ stops more than 98% of harsh UV in its tracks
name: Indyeva Vicolo Convertible Pants - Women's
